markdownRemark.html:
I am taking control! Yes, I have made the leap and now control my own content here, on my own self-hosted blog. Do you like what I’ve done with the place?

It hasn’t all been roses, and I intend to cover the complications in a future post, but for the most part I feel confident in my decision to move away from Medium. There is however, one thing that I feel I am missing.

Applause.

This is the applause feature, created by Medium. It works kind of like Facebook’s like button, except you can click it multiple times. It’s dead simple, and it improves the user experience for everybody:

  • The author gets clear, purposeful feedback on their content.
  • The reader gets a fun and flexible way to interact with the post.

Applause in action…barely

The value of allowing readers to click it multiple times is clear as soon as you read something you really like. Click 10 times, and all of a sudden you feel empowered. Expressing the scale of your enjoyment goes along way. It really does feel like applauding.

What about self hosted blogs?
